    • Units of measurement

Tabular ICU data

icu_tbl.Rd

Two objects central to ricu, id_tbl and ts_tbl (both inheriting from icu_tbl) are used to represent tabular data.

is_icu_tbl(x)

id_tbl(..., id, id_opts = NULL)

as_id_tbl(x, ...)

# S3 method for default
as_id_tbl(x, id, id_opts = NULL, ...)

is_id_tbl(x)

ts_tbl(..., id, id_opts = NULL, index = NULL, interval = hours(1L))

as_ts_tbl(x, ...)

# S3 method for default
as_ts_tbl(x, id, id_opts = NULL, index = NULL, interval = hours(1L), ...)

is_ts_tbl(x)

# S3 method for ts_tbl
as_id_tbl(x, ...)

Arguments

x

Object to test/coerce
...

forwarded to data.table::data.table() or generic consistency
id

String valued column name used as id column
id_opts

NULL or a named character vector indicating options to which ids may be converted see change_id()
index

Name of index column
interval

Time spacing between rows
